text:
Joe came to welcome my friend to his place and walk her through the house. 
I didn't meet Joe in person but my friend mentioned that he was really nice, making her feel welcomed.

I would say that Joe's place look even better than the pictures. The kitchen is super open, spacious, and with great appliances. We didn't cook there but I imagine it must be so amazing to cook or grill a steak there. Only by standing in the kitchen would make you feel like a professional chef, haha.

I really enjoyed the pieces that Joe put together. He has a unique taste, but we were amazed by how the pieces fit so well to the place.

The best part for us was the rooftop. It was spacious with a projector TV and nice sound system. The couches are super giant and comfy. We were all very tired; otherwise, it should be a fun place to hang out and have some drinks.

All in all, it was a great experience. I highly recommend anyone to stay at his place!!!
title: Contemporary Austin Townhome
